summary: "Outer Wilds" is a video game where you explore a solar system stuck in a 22-minute time loop. Each loop ends with a supernova that destroys everything. You uncover an alien race's history, the Nomai, to find out why this is happening. The game started as a student project and won many awards. It was released on multiple platforms and got mostly good reviews. An expansion called "Echoes of the Eye" added more to the story. "Outer Wilds" was named one of the best games of 2019 and the decade.
title: Outer Wilds
